Effect: Requires: 1 "Guardsman" in the Battle to Kill
All @actioncard have @power Equal to it's @move, or 2 if not specified
Dies if total @power is less than 18. Survives if total @power is 18 or more
Resolve this Quest as if it has @capacity 4
If Survives, each Player Removes 1 @actioncard in their Discard Pile with the lowest @power from the game
Resolve this Quest as if it has 23 @hp if there are 3 or more @actioncard with 2 or less @power in the battle
Flip all @rondeltile which don't have a player on them
Add a random unplayed @rondeltile Clockwise of the @rondeltile the Leader is on
Requires: A @knighticon, @wizardicon, and @rogueicon in the Battle to Kill
When resolving the Quest, use all @actioncard on the Quest
